backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing access control, user profiles, valid symbol management, watchlists, and cycle‑safe HTTP outcall checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script adding validSymbols and userWatchlists while preserving existing userProfiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing key frontend files and their responsibilities for build planning.
frontend/docs/coingecko-debug-dfx.md: Developer guide for deploying and testing CoinGecko debug fetch functionality using dfx.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React application via root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component coordinating identity, actor initialization, routing, profile gating, and page rendering.
Dialog component that loads valid symbols, displays a searchable picker, and adds selected symbols to the user's watchlist.
frontend/src/components/BackendTesterEnt: Admin-checking button that handles loading, error, and non-admin states with tooltips and navigation.
frontend/src/components/ConfigErrorBound: Empty or placeholder file for a configuration-related error boundary.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionBootst: Manages backend actor initialization, timeouts, and recovery UI before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionDetail: Expandable debug panel showing authentication, actor state, diagnostics, and error info with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionRecove: Empty or placeholder component for connection recovery dialog.
frontend/src/components/CryptoCard.tsx: Displays live market data for a crypto symbol with error handling and opens a detailed dialog.
frontend/src/components/CryptoDetailDial: Dialog showing forecast charts and settings for a crypto symbol with resettable state per open.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer with attribution and a disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/ForecastChart.ts: Fetches historical prices, computes regression and moving averages, and renders forecast chart data with error states.
frontend/src/components/ForecastSettings: UI panel allowing users to adjust moving average periods and forecast horizons using sliders.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header handling theme toggling, authentication, and optional user registration.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing prompt presenting app features and a login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/PriceEntryManage: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for users to enter and save their profile name during initial setup.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedBashPan: Interactive terminal-like panel executing backend commands with reconnection logic and admin controls.
frontend/src/components/SymbolPicker.tsx: Searchable list component for selecting cryptocurrency symbols.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistManager: Card UI for future watchlist features, currently showing a placeholder alert.
frontend/src/components/WatchlistPriceTi: Displays a single crypto’s live price, 24h change, and errors using live market data queries.
Renders a card listing multiple WatchlistPriceTickRow components or an empty-state alert.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorEnhanced.ts: Adds diagnostics, timeout handling, and retry logic on top of useActor for more robust actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRecovery: Empty placeholder file for future connection recovery logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and related state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for user profile, admin checks, user roles, and live/historical crypto market data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark theme color tokens and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts App.
frontend/src/pages/BackendTesterPage.tsx: Admin-aware page that displays backend diagnostic info and a simulated command console with access checks and error panels.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing watchlist tools, price ticks, and popular crypto cards, with optional navigation to backend tester.
frontend/src/utils/backendTesterCommands: Defines backend tester command metadata and execution logic, including parsing and categorization for various backend operations.
frontend/src/utils/coinGeckoHistoricalDa: Parses CoinGecko historical price responses into normalized timestamp/price arrays with error handling.
frontend/src/utils/coinGeckoMarketData.t: Parses CoinGecko market data responses and formats price and market cap values for display.
frontend/src/utils/connectionErrors.ts: Provides helpers to detect cycle, configuration, and network errors and normalize them into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values for routing and state retention.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended components, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata including current progress, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature records.
